data: {"page":1,"results":[{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99,36,10770],"id":395663,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Attenborough at 90: Behind the Lens","overview":"As Sir David Attenborough turns 90, this intimate film presents new interviews, eye-opening behind-the-scenes footage and extraordinary clips from some of his most recent films. The doc, which was made for the occasion of Attenborough’s 90th birthday, was shot over seven years and follows him as he travels to Borneo, Morocco and the Galapagos to shoot wildlife specials. Anthony Geffen, the CEO of Atlantic Productions, commented, “This is such a special Attenborough film because unusually he is the subject. As I look back over the last seven years, I never fail to be amazed by his extraordinary ambition and drive to use the very latest technology to communicate the natural world to audiences around the globe. This film gives audiences the chance to see what it’s like to be on the road with David.”","popularity":3.561,"poster_path":"/zR9ySn9KgkBTblzrXi1SSNTnxAO.jpg","release_date":"2016-04-30","title":"Attenborough at 90: Behind the Lens","video":false,"vote_average":8.4,"vote_count":7},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18,36],"id":236795,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Teddy the Rough Rider","overview":"This short follows the political career of Theodore Roosevelt, beginning in 1895, when he was appointed police commissioner of New York City. In 1897 he was appointed Assistant Secretary of the Navy. His charge up San Juan Hill during the Spanish-American War in 1898 is re-created. He becomes vice president in March 1901 and assumes the presidency when William McKinley is assassinated six months later. According to the narrator, Roosevelt refused to be beholden to political bosses, doing what he believed to be right for the American people.","popularity":3.353,"poster_path":"/y2m7Ip6YziLfHQTY9A05QH5m6aH.jpg","release_date":"1940-02-21","title":"Teddy the Rough Rider","video":false,"vote_average":5.9,"vote_count":7},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99,10751],"id":1029985,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Cell phones P.s. Over a phone call, she recites an email she wrote seven years prior.","popularity":0.969,"poster_path":"/o81NA64CXkDq8FXVJZGdOUKjIom.jpg","release_date":"2022-09-02","title":"Cell phones P.s. Just a small add on","video":false,"vote_average":10.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/aCO2cuBZNnjufanDWVkxnfYhuYp.jpg","genre_ids":[99,10402],"id":866617,"original_language":"he","original_title":"המלכה שושנה","overview":"Shoshana Damari was the first Israeli diva. She graced local and international stages, stirring millions with her beguiling voice and spectacular performance. Yet behind the larger-than-life persona and her memorable songs was a woman about whom we know little. She didn’t like to be interviewed and never volunteered details about herself and her family. Hers was the life of a Hollywood legend and she paid the price for it. This is a story about fame and loneliness, acclaim and loss, daring and compromise. For the first time, the woman behind the crown, the cloak and the palace will come to light.","popularity":5.562,"poster_path":"/fFOyYie187Tm3QGPQ8RdQgKcv8M.jpg","release_date":"2021-07-03","title":"המלכה שושנה","video":false,"vote_average":9.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":236156,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Putin's Games","overview":"The 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi, Russia will be the first ever to be held in a subtropical resort. The most expensive games ever break all records when it comes to corruption and megalomania. Putin's administration has everyone at its beck and call, from oligarchs down to the ordinary people who have to pay the Olympic bill. Both the powerful and the weak speak out in this investigative documentary, which unveils the hidden story behind Putin's games. Government critic Garry Kasparov says that Putin's Olympic propaganda is really all about speeding up the privatization of land in Sochi. Many inhabitants have had to make way for hotels, ski jumps and a large harbor, which were subsequently swept away by storms and landslides – the Olympic village was built on a swamp in the hottest region of Russia. To a large extent, the story of these environmentally unfriendly Olympic Games is one of threats and enormous misappropriations of money.","popularity":0.755,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2013-12-06","title":"Putin's Games","video":false,"vote_average":5.5,"vote_count":4},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":551391,"original_language":"cs","original_title":"Archa světel a stínů","overview":"The forgotten story of Martin and Osa Johnson, rebel filmmakers and Kansas natives who made some of the first films in Africa in times when filming itself was more dangerous than lions or malaria.","popularity":0.762,"poster_path":"/tvNhWvLMVsl3yzFwgpW8e4GMNNU.jpg","release_date":"2018-03-17","title":"The Ark of Lights and Shadows","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/dnaWoxLbqyCVfy9soBSARdSw7Xx.jpg","genre_ids":[18],"id":551395,"original_language":"en","original_title":"The Maestro","overview":"After the Second World War, budding film composer Jerry Herst moves to Hollywood to study with infamous master teacher Mario Castelnuovo-Tedesco.","popularity":2.439,"poster_path":"/3s9fCk37kQk2uPN9FaPwBZitwRh.jpg","release_date":"2020-03-27","title":"The Maestro","video":false,"vote_average":6.8,"vote_count":4},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99,18],"id":705485,"original_language":"es","original_title":"Kunstkammer","overview":"","popularity":0.445,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2014-06-12","title":"Kunstkammer","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/pC8pDMBFZr99EgBH9WjfZn53w9l.jpg","genre_ids":[18],"id":395726,"original_language":"ru","original_title":"Коробка","overview":"Kostya and his friends are young and love playing street football.
